ops.js: fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:2, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Bugenhagen
“…The warrior who fought
against the Gi.”{PAUSE}“He kept them from taking even
one step into Cosmo Canyon.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // Bugenhagen
“Look, Nanaki.
Look at your father,
at the warrior, Seto.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Bugenhagen
“Seto continued to fight the Gi tribe here.
…To protect this Canyon.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Bugenhagen
“Even after the Gi's poisonous arrows
turned his body to stone……”{PAUSE}“Even after they all ran away…
Seto, continued to protect us.”{PAUSE}“And he continues to protect us,
even now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // Bugenhagen
“You thought that he was a coward
and ran away. But he, alone risked
his life to protect Cosmo Canyon.”{PAUSE}“That is your father, Seto.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Red XIII}
“That…is Seto?
…!?
Did Mother know?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo…She knew.
The two of them made me promise
to keep this cave shut.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Bugenhagen
“They asked me to seal it myself
and not to tell a soul.”{PAUSE}“They said we should
forget about this cave.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // Bugenhagen
“{Cloud} says they are
trying to save the Planet.”{PAUSE}“Honestly, I don't think
it can be done.”{PAUSE}“For even if they stop every reactor
on the Planet, it's only going
to postpone the inevitable.”{PAUSE}“Even if they stop Sephiroth,
everything will perish.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // Bugenhagen
“I wanted to show you your real father
before you left…”{PAUSE}Bugenhagen
“I'm so glad that you came back
while I was still alive to show you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // {Red XIII}
“Grandpa…don't talk like that.
I don't want to think of life…
without you…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Well, I've had a long life.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // {Red XIII}
“Grandpa!
You must live!”{PAUSE}{Red XIII}
“I'll see to it.”{PAUSE}“I'll see to what's happening
to the Planet. And I'll come
back to tell you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // {Red XIII}
“I am Nanaki of
Cosmo Canyon!
The son of the
warrior, Seto!”{PAUSE}“I'll come back a
warrior true
to that noble name!
So please, Grandpa…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Bugenhagen
“But he was never able to
return to town…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Bugenhagen
“{Cloud}…
Would you mind leaving
the two of us alone?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // Bugenhagen
“Nanaki. I want you to
continue your journey with
{Cloud} and the others.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // Bugenhagen
“But, Nanaki.
I've been thinking lately.”{PAUSE}“I've been thinking if there was
anything WE could do,”{PAUSE}“as a part of the Planet, something
to help a Planet already
in misery…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:20}); // Bugenhagen
“No matter what happens,
isn't it important to try?”{PAUSE}“Am I just wishing against fate?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // Bugenhagen
“I am too old to do
anything about it…”{PAUSE}“This year, I'll be 130.
Ho Ho Hoooo.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // Bugenhagen
“That is why, Nanaki, you must
go with them! For my sake.”

dialogStrings: Cet Wall

{Red XIII}
“This is…”

Bugenhagen
“…The warrior who fought
against the Gi.”{PAUSE}“He kept them from taking even
one step into Cosmo Canyon.”

Bugenhagen
“But he was never able to
return to town…”

Bugenhagen
“Look, Nanaki.
Look at your father,
at the warrior, Seto.”

{Red XIII}
“…That…
That's…Seto?”

Bugenhagen
“Seto continued to fight the Gi tribe here.
…To protect this Canyon.”

Bugenhagen
“Even after the Gi's poisonous arrows
turned his body to stone……”{PAUSE}“Even after they all ran away…
Seto, continued to protect us.”{PAUSE}“And he continues to protect us,
even now.”

{Red XIII}
“Even now…”

Bugenhagen
“You thought that he was a coward
and ran away. But he, alone risked
his life to protect Cosmo Canyon.”{PAUSE}“That is your father, Seto.”

{Red XIII}
“That…is Seto?
…!?
Did Mother know?”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo…She knew.
The two of them made me promise
to keep this cave shut.”

Bugenhagen
“They asked me to seal it myself
and not to tell a soul.”{PAUSE}“They said we should
forget about this cave.”

{Red XIII}
“…”

Bugenhagen
“{Cloud}…
Would you mind leaving
the two of us alone?”

Bugenhagen
“Nanaki. I want you to
continue your journey with
{Cloud} and the others.”

{Red XIII}
“Grandpa!?”

Bugenhagen
“Listen, Nanaki.”

Bugenhagen
“{Cloud} says they are
trying to save the Planet.”{PAUSE}“Honestly, I don't think
it can be done.”{PAUSE}“For even if they stop every reactor
on the Planet, it's only going
to postpone the inevitable.”{PAUSE}“Even if they stop Sephiroth,
everything will perish.”

Bugenhagen
“But, Nanaki.
I've been thinking lately.”{PAUSE}“I've been thinking if there was
anything WE could do,”{PAUSE}“as a part of the Planet, something
to help a Planet already
in misery…”

Bugenhagen
“No matter what happens,
isn't it important to try?”{PAUSE}“Am I just wishing against fate?”

Bugenhagen
“I am too old to do
anything about it…”{PAUSE}“This year, I'll be 130.
Ho Ho Hoooo.”

Bugenhagen
“That is why, Nanaki, you must
go with them! For my sake.”

{Red XIII}
“Grandpa…”

Bugenhagen
“I wanted to show you your real father
before you left…”{PAUSE}Bugenhagen
“I'm so glad that you came back
while I was still alive to show you.”

{Red XIII}
“Grandpa…don't talk like that.
I don't want to think of life…
without you…”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hoooo.
Well, I've had a long life.”

{Red XIII}
“Grandpa!
You must live!”{PAUSE}{Red XIII}
“I'll see to it.”{PAUSE}“I'll see to what's happening
to the Planet. And I'll come
back to tell you.”

Bugenhagen
“Nanaki…”

{Red XIII}
“I am Nanaki of
Cosmo Canyon!
The son of the
warrior, Seto!”{PAUSE}“I'll come back a
warrior true
to that noble name!
So please, Grandpa…”

Bugenhagen
“That's…Seto's…
Seto…”

{Red XIII}
“Seto…
Fa…Father…”
